group_1.textRight: ...Kirimine Town collapsed,@and Chiharu and Sunao...

group_1.textLeft: I want to say it's just a dream...
But it was just so vivid...
I couldn't bring myself to talk about it in@front of Charu and Sunao...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I get it...you don't want them to hear@something like that...
It's easy to get anxious when something@so big is at stake...

group_1.textLeft: And...I hate myself for feeling that way...
I don't understand why...I feel so weak@after that dream...

group_1.textRight: ...Say, when'd you start feeling anxious,@exactly?
Was it right after the dream?

group_1.textLeft: ...Eh, I think so...?

group_1.textRight: You sure...?
The people of your village have been@doing this for ages.
Everyone's anxious about so much@changing, right?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
Still, we've finally broken free from@Mikoshiba's grip.
We must change...

group_1.textRight: Yes... Even if we all think stuff like that@in our heads,
we also can't help but worry about it,
because we have to give up the things@we're used to.
I could be wrong, but...
...maybe it's possible that their anxiety@has been rubbing off on you?

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean...?

group_1.textRight: Shizuka, you think of yourself as...
...the leader of the whole clan, right?

group_1.textLeft: But of course. I'm the heir to the head family.

group_1.textRight: ...So for that reason,
you think you need to be the strongest person out of@everyone, but you don’t know if you’re capable of@being that…
So your anxiety's been building@more and more…
And maybe it all blew up in that@dream you had...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hm?!
You're right...perhaps that's it...
But this isn't the appropriate time for me@to be anxious.

group_1.textRight: I don't think being anxious is a bad thing.

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: ...I mean, for me...
I didn't actually become a cheerleader@until after elementary school...
Before then, I was actually an avid@baseball player.

group_1.textLeft: What?
Erm...so you quit playing because you@wanted to support the others?

group_1.textRight: No...
At my school, once you hit junior high and beyond,@girls aren't permitted to participate in sports,
so I couldn't move forward as a player@like I wanted to...

group_1.textLeft: Didn't you hate that...?

group_1.textRight: I did at first, very much so.
Even after I decided to become a cheerleader,@I still had some worries...
Like, players and cheerleaders are different,
so I wondered if I'd still be considered@a teammate like I was before...
Stuff like that.
I'm afraid of change.
I think anxiety is inevitable...
So I think we should acknowledge@that anxiety, face it,
and figure out how to overcome it.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:102501:cheek_0][chara:102501:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:102501:lipSynch_1]Ah...
...My heart ached when I saw everyone@looking so anxious.
With Mikoshiba gone, the clan was supposed@to be moving in the right direction,
but in the village, there were people who@were dissatisfied and apprehensive...
I have no way of assuaging those concerns.
And if things didn't go smoothly@leading into the ritual...
I'd hurt the people I cared about@even more,
and that scared me...
The feeling grew and grew,@and it worried me so...

group_1.textRight: But I'm sure you can do it, Shizuka.
I know you can get over that scary feeling.

group_1.textLeft: Really...?

group_1.textRight: Yes! In my case, thanks to my brother@and the rest of the team,
I was able to be part of the gang even if@I couldn't be on the field.
I know you have people who believe in you@and support you.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...

group_1.textCenter: Our moms and the other villagers are going through@all the old documents that were left behind.
...and we’ll prove that we can protect@the village ourselves.

group_1.textLeft: (Charu and Sunao...our mothers...)
(Everyone in the village is trying to support us@even though they're worried...)

group_1.textRight: So it's okay for you to be scared and anxious.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, you're right.

group_1.textRight: GO! FIGHT! WIN! ...You know the drill!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Go! Fite! Win!
We have to do what we can instead of@letting our anxiety hold us back!
For the sake of everyone who believes in us!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* You finally smiled!

group_1.textLeft: Oh...you're right! [chara:102501:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102501:cheek_0][chara:102501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102501:lipSynch_1]I think I'm better now.

group_1.textRight: Then let's reach out to Sunao and everyone@so we can meet up with them!

group_1.textLeft: Shizukaaaa! What a relief...! You're safe!
Miss Utsuho protected you, yes?

group_1.textRight: "Protected me"...@[chara:102501:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102501:motion_100][chara:102501:cheek_0][chara:102501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102501:lipSynch_1]Yes, you could say that! *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: Huh...? Are you feeling better now,@Shizuka?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I am!

group_1.textLeft: We can't possibly thank you enough,@Natsuki.

group_1.textRight: Huh...? [chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300201:motion_300][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]Nah, I didn't do anything!
